sentences.en: And online Korean historical fora are absolutely replete with a similar historical understanding.
sentences.cn: (君是传说中高句丽神秘的开国国君)在韩国网上的历史论坛里到处都充斥着类似的历史观点.

sentences.en: Everything in her person was round and replete, though without those accumulations which suggest heaviness.
sentences.cn: 她身上的一切都圆圆的,显得饱满, 然而并不给人以笨重的肥胖感觉.

sentences.en: From the beginning, this crisis was replete with ironies.
sentences.cn: 从一开始, 这场危机就充满了讽刺意味.

sentences.en: His house is replete with domestic appliances , like air - conditioner, washing machine, refrigerator, dish washer, etc.
sentences.cn: 他的房子家庭电器一应俱全:冷气 、 衣机 、 箱 、 碗机等应有尽有.

sentences.en: His story was replete with falsehood.
His voice broken, yet piercing , uttered with difficulty the words so replete with anguish.
sentences.cn: 他用颤抖而尖利的嗓音, 艰难地吐出那些浸透着痛苦的言词.

sentences.en: History is replete with examples of populations out of control.
sentences.cn: 历史上人口失控的例子比比皆是。

sentences.en: It is already perfect, pure and replete with all virtuous, inconceivable Buddha - qualities.
sentences.cn: 它已经是完美的, 纯洁的并且充满了所有善良的, 不可思议的佛素质.

sentences.en: It was a big meal and we all felt replete.
sentences.cn: 这是丰盛的一餐,我们都吃得很饱.

sentences.en: Replete, guests can then retire to the modern conservatory for coffee.
sentences.cn: 吃饱喝足后，宾客们可以到现代化的暖房里享受一杯咖啡。

sentences.en: The Disneyland tour was replete with unexpected thrills and suspense.
sentences.cn: 到迪斯尼乐园旅游充满无数意想不到的惊喜和刺激.

sentences.en: The Harbor was replete with boats.
The harbour was replete with boats.
Third point , Iraq's record on chemical weapons is replete with lies.
sentences.cn: 第三, 伊拉克的化学武器记录充满了谎言.

sentences.en: This immense space may be replete with happiness and glory.
sentences.cn: 这巨大的空间可能充满了幸福和光荣.

trans.tran_cn: 饱食的，充满的，供应充足的
